domains.name: CAD Geometry Core
domains.description: Core CAD geometry modeling, parametric design, feature-based modeling, BREP operations

domains.name: Computer Vision for Geometry
domains.description: Vision-based geometry understanding, image-to-CAD, 3D reconstruction from images

domains.name: Reinforcement Learning for Geometry
domains.description: RL-based CAD generation, geometric policy learning, sequential geometry construction

domains.name: Diffusion Models for Geometry
domains.description: Diffusion-based generative models for CAD and geometric shapes

domains.name: Multimodal Geometry Models
domains.description: Text-to-CAD, language-driven design, multimodal geometric generation

domains.name: Graph-Based Geometry Learning
domains.description: Graph neural networks for CAD, feature graphs, topological learning

domains.name: Sketch / Constraint Understanding
domains.description: 2D sketch understanding, constraint solving, sketch-based modeling

domains.name: Shape Representation Learning
domains.description: Learning geometric representations, shape encodings, latent geometry spaces

domains.name: Other Geometry-CAD AI
domains.description: Other geometry-centric CAD AI research not fitting above categories

techniques.name: GNN
techniques.description: Graph Neural Networks for geometric structures

techniques.name: Diffusion
techniques.description: Diffusion models, denoising diffusion, score-based models

representations.name: Feature Graph
representations.description: Feature trees, CAD graphs, topological graphs

representations.name: Implicit
representations.description: Implicit representations, SDF, signed distance fields
